This Name Logo necklace is designed to make your daily wear meaningful, with artistic pieces that reflect your individuality, resonate with personal meaning, are crafted to be wearable, and celebrate your every day.

Get custom socks with your very own fur babies face on them! They make the perfect gift for anyone who loves their dog! Perfect for any holiday, birthday, or anniversary! Handmade by local part time moms in Portland, Oregon every pair is made to order.
HOW TO SEND IMAGES
You will receive an emailed link within 30 minutes of placing your order to upload your images for us to crop. If you can't find your link in your email, feel free to message us and we can send over Etsy message as well. By default we crop the face, so please leave a note on the upload page if you would like it cropped differently.
SIZING
Small (Youth Shoe Size 12-3) (Women's Shoe Size 4-6)
Medium (Youth Shoe Size 3-6) (Men's Shoe Size 6-9) (Women's Shoe Size 6-10)
Large (Men's Shoe Size 9-12) (Women's Shoe Size 10-15)
Extra-Large (Men's Shoe Size 12-17)
GROUP DISCOUNTS
If you are looking to buy more than 25 pairs please message me and I can get you our group discount pricing!
Feel free to message us with any other questions and we will get back to you ASAP.
Photo Socks, Custom Socks, Socks, Personalized Socks, Custom Printed Socks, Picture Socks, Photo Gift, Custom Photo Socks, Photos on Socks, Gift idea, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Christmas Gift, Stocking Stuffer, Birthday Gift, Perfect Gift Idea, Dog Lover Gift, Gift for Dog Lover, Puppy Gift, Anniversary, Wedding, Fur Baby, Softest Comfortable Socks
For best results of washing these socks, we recommend turning them inside out, washing with similar colored laundry in cold water, and air dry to prevent shrinking. Do not use bleach!

data.description:
This personalized birth flower candle is the perfect gift for a friend's birthday.

The label features the month of birth and matching illustrated birth flower in a delicate design, your personalized message and the recipient's name along with your chosen scent. The design has a lovely botanical look with a feminine feel.

Available with the following birth flower options:

JANUARY Carnation
FEBRUARY Violet
MARCH Daffodil
APRIL Sweet Pea
MAY Lily
JUNE Rose
JULY Larkspur
AUGUST Gladiolus
SEPTEMBER Aster
OCTOBER Cosmos
NOVEMBER Chrysanthemum
DECEMBER Narcissus

All of our candles are made with an earth-friendly coconut wax blend. The 180ml jar candle is presented in an apothecary style jar with screw-top lid and filled with a natural plant-based wax in a choice of beautiful scents.

The dimensions of this candle are 8.2cm x 6.3cm and the net wax weight of this jar candle is 140g, giving an estimated average total burn time of 30 hours.

We're proud to say that all of our products and the packaging is plastic free.

180ml candle has a burn time of up to 30 hours
Earth-friendly coconut wax blend
Hand poured with thought and care in small batches
Candle comes in a box - ideal for gifting
Complimentary matches sent with every order

BEACH HUT
Take a stroll along the beach front, stop by the beach hut as you breathe in the sea salt air. Let the fragrance refresh your mind.

BLOSSOM
Dance in the sweet sunlight of spring, as you welcome the fresh breeze and take in the sweet velvety floral opulence.

COAST PATH
This invigorating scent reminds us of taking in the captivating views, and listening to the roar of the waves as we walked along the coast in Cornwall.

CRANBERRY ORANGE
The classic combination of Cranberry & Orange. With refreshing orange and sweet cranberry combined, and notes of raspberry, apricot and peach.

LAVENDER & VANILLA
A cosy and familiar fragrance with notes of tranquil lavender and sweet amber and vanilla.

LILY & TANGERINE
A fresh and vibrant lily fragrance with top notes of bergamot and tangerine. Followed by middle notes of lotus, freesia and rose smoothed by a musky floral base.

ROMANCE
A love story embraced by essences of sweet floral and fruity twists.

VANILLA & SANDALWOOD
A seductive and luxurious aroma, with notes of vanilla nestled on a bed of soft musky notes. A very popular scent which makes the perfect gift.

WILDFLOWERS
Delight in the enchanting and colourful wildflower meadow, a welcome sign of spring and summer. Notes of lily, orchid, watery jasmine, iris, violet, and rose.

WINTER ROSE & PINK PEPPER
This luxurious floral fragrance, has notes of pink pepper, cassis and olibanum, encased in delicate petal of roses and geranium. A base of tonka, vanilla and balsams.

WOODLAND TRAIL
Ground yourself with this woody, mystical scent. Inspired by grounding elements of the forest to nourish and connect with the wilderness.

CANDLE CARE AND SAFETY
These candles have a real flame and fire is hot! Please apply common sense and be cautious always when lighting and handling a lit candle.

Candles must be kept well clear of all combustible materials including flammable decorations, foliage and electrical equipment.

Don’t leave a lit candle unattended.

When lighting for the first time, please allow the wax to melt to the very sides of the jar – if you don’t do this, it can cause the candle to ‘tunnel’ and waste wax. The maximum recommended burn time is 4 hrs per burn. Always trim wick after each burn to 5mm by cutting off the burnt ends when cool. Not trimming the wick will cause the flame to become large.

The candle vessel will get hot. Never burn the candle wax fully, leaving a minimum of 5mm of wax in the base of the jar. Always place the candle on top of a coaster to avoid damage to furniture.

We suggest the room to be well ventilated.
